powerups.description: Removes two incorrect answers from the options
powerups.description_uz: Variantlardan ikkita noto'g'ri javobni olib tashlaydi

powerups.name: Skip Question
powerups.description: Skip this question without losing points or streak
powerups.description_uz: Ball yo'qotmasdan va strekni buzmasdan savolni o'tkazib yuborish

powerups.name: Extra Time
powerups.description: Add 10 extra seconds to answer this question
powerups.description_uz: Javob berish uchun 10 soniya qo'shimcha vaqt olish

powerups.name: Hint
powerups.description: Show a helpful hint about the answer (25% point penalty)
powerups.description_uz: Javob haqida yordam ko'rsatish (25% ball jarima)

powerups.name: Double Points
powerups.description: Double the points for the next correct answer
powerups.description_uz: Keyingi to'g'ri javob uchun ballni ikki baravar oshirish

powerup_refill.description: All powerups are refilled at the start of each session
